name: dist_to_groads
title: Distance to Roads
description: Distance to roads, measured in meters, based on the Global Roads Open Access Dataset (gRoads) version 1.0.
details: The gRoads data set combines the best available roads data by country into a global roads coverage map. Because the data are compiled from multiple sources, the date range for road network representations ranges from the 1980s to 2010 depending on the country (most countries have no confirmed date), and spatial accuracy varies.

extract_types_info.mean: average distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
